title: 이달의소녀탐구 #333 (LOONA TV #333)
members: Olivia Hye, Go Won, Chuu, Yves, JinSoul, HeeJin
summary:
Generally talking about past shootings and HeeJin teaching Olivia Hye.
0:01 -- A
white rabbit appeared! HeeJin!
0:04 -- HeeJin and the girls talking about where the scene from Cinema Theory
(The Scene where Yves was walking along 12 chairs and sitting on the first seat)
was filmed. It was the same location where Egoist was filmed!
0:08 -- Olivia Hye talks about the picture (video too?) of her sitting on the 12th chair
for the Premier Greeting "Line&Up" teaser (which was also filmed at the same location.)
“very close because they are the same age.”
0:11 -- JinSoul: "But that wasn't released!"
0:17 -- LOOΠΔ's new version of their cheer. "LOOΠΔ, LOOΠΔ, Let's Go!"
0:19 -- Filming starts again and Olivia looked stiff.
0:30 -- So the director and HeeJin decided to give her advices.
0:46 -- And finally, Olivia Hye looked much natural!
0:57 -- HeeJin: "She's really admirable! Our Olivia~".
